        public StorageCell write_file(java.io.File _file,
                              FileVersion _version)
        Description copied from interface: Location
        Writes the file to user's locations. Needs the _version to determine user and checksum of the file for deduplication (const var)
        Parameters:
        _file - file that is written to a cache location.
        _version - the fileversion to make persistent
        Returns:
        id of location which got the file
